author: jdcasey
msg: Creating branch to do refactor of the maven-project interpolator to use plexus-interpolation (used to be the interpolation code from plexus-utils, which is what the assembly plugin uses).

author: lhein
msg: - fixed wrong dependency scope for JSR-223 lib -> this lib is packaged in the SE so we don't need it here

author: doll
msg: The dataservice restful code now outputs xml with the beanXmlConverter if the format=atom. It does this by setting the converter field on the handler to the appropriate BeanConverter impl.
Also made the handlers injected by class instead of object. This gives us the ability to make a new instance for each handler. So, the handlers can keep track of state if they need to.
End to end tests coming soon...

author: lhein
msg: - added missing ns declaration for replaceMe ns

author: doll
msg: Pulled the InjectedServlet injector out into a protected field so that subclasses can use it.
